channel.title: CVE Feed for Zyxel -- ARMOR Z2 (NBG6817) firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zyxel -- ARMOR Z2 (NBG6817) firmware

item.title: CVE-2021-4030|2024-08-03T17:16:03.558Z -- zyxel -- armor%20z2%20%28nbg6817%29%20firmware
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in the HTTP daemon of the Zyxel ARMOR Z1/Z2 firmware could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary commands if they coerce or trick a local user to visit a compromised website with malicious scripts.

item.title: CVE-2021-4029|2024-08-03T17:16:03.566Z -- zyxel -- armor%20z2%20%28nbg6817%29%20firmware
item.description: A command injection vulnerability in the CGI program of the Zyxel ARMOR Z1/Z2 firmware could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands via a LAN interface.
